sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Kbd package contains the chvt, deallocvt, dumpkeys, fgconsole, getkeycodes, kbd_mode, kbdrate, loadkeys, loadunimap, mapscrn, psfxtable, resizecons, screendump, setfont, setkeycodes, setleds, setmetamode, setvesablank, showfont, showkey, unicode_start, and unicode_stop programs. There are some other programs that don't get installed by default, as they are very optional. Take a look at the Kbd package contents if you have trouble with your console.

sect3.title: chvt
sect3.para: chvt changes foreground virtual terminal.

sect3.title: deallocvt
sect3.para: deallocvt deallocates unused virtual terminals.

sect3.title: dumpkeys
sect3.para: dumpkeys dumps keyboard translation tables.

sect3.title: fgconsole
sect3.para: fgconsole prints the number of the active virtual terminal.

sect3.title: getkeycodes
sect3.para: getkeycodes prints the kernel scancode-to-keycode mapping table.

sect3.title: kbd_mode
sect3.para: kbd_mode reports or sets the keyboard mode.

sect3.title: kbdrate
sect3.para: kbdrate sets the keyboard repeat and delay rates.

sect3.title: loadkeys
sect3.para: loadkeys loads keyboard translation tables.

sect3.title: loadunimap
sect3.para: loadunimap loads the kernel unicode-to-font mapping table.

sect3.title: mapscrn
sect3.para: mapscrn loads a user defined output character mapping table into the console driver. Note that it is obsolete and that its features are built into setfont.

sect3.title: psfxtable
sect3.para: psfxtable is a tool for handling Unicode character tables for console fonts.

sect3.title: resizecons
sect3.para: resizecons changes the kernel idea of the console size.

sect3.title: screendump
sect3.para: A screen shot utility for the console.

sect3.title: setfont
sect3.para: This lets you change the EGA/VGA fonts in console.

sect3.title: setkeycodes
sect3.para: setkeycodes loads kernel scancode-to-keycode mapping table entries.

sect3.title: setleds
sect3.para: setleds sets the keyboard LEDs. Many people find it useful to have numlock enabled by default, and it is by using this program that you can achieve this.

sect3.title: setmetamode
sect3.para: setmetamode defines the keyboard meta key handling.

sect3.title: setvesablank
sect3.para: This lets you fiddle with the built-in hardware screensaver (not toasters, only a blank screen).

sect3.title: showfont
sect3.para: showfont displays data about a font. The information shown includes font information, font properties, character metrics, and character bitmaps.

sect3.title: showkey
sect3.para: showkey examines the scancodes and keycodes sent by the keyboard.

sect3.title: unicode_start
sect3.para: unicode_start puts the console in Unicode mode.

sect3.title: unicode_stop
sect3.para: unicode_stop reverts keyboard and console from unicode mode.
